data.title: Great food & regular car shows in car park
data.text: We visited a Sunday car show in Original Mikes car park. After looking at the cars we had lunch on the patio whilst listening to a live band.  The food was good and reasonably priced. Very enjoyable and a great atmosphere.

data.title: Excellent Food and Live Music
data.text: Food is very good.  Reasonably priced and good variety on menu.  Healthy options too including delicious wraps, salads and garden burgers. In the evenings it's lively atmosphere in bar and patio area.  Have music indoors and on the outside patio. Sofas outside for chilling while listening to great music.   Great for parties or just dining if want good food.  Dining area in back of restaurant is quiet and has nice fireplace too.  Large TV in main bar area showing sports events if you like sports.  Great find in Santa Ana!

data.title: Good Time But Not ASafe Time
data.text: I recently went to Origional Mikes for a birthday party. The restaurant is in an old building in down town Santa Ana Ca. The place was obviously run down due to age. The food was ok but not great. The drinks were reasonably priced and pored well. As far as the crowd in the establishment goes you need to be careful. I witnessed several people getting thrown out by security for both fighting and being too intoxicated. The place even had several police dept cruisers in the parking lot waiting for something bad to happen. We managed to make the best of our night with some old friends but needless to say we will not be going back anytime soon.

data.title: Quick Lunch
data.text: Stopped in for lunch after a day browsing firework places. All 3 in my party ordered 3 different burgers and everyone seemed pleased. The server rarely came by and we regularly sat with empty glasses of water. I loved the décor and the a/c was really nice. Good amount of options and the prices weren't too shabby either.

data.title: Good food in a fun setting
data.text:
i habe

CE been for lunch and decided to bring my husband for dinner.  First, we were seated at a dirty table, so the hostess moved us to a new location.  Our waitress did not seem familiar with the menu...she struggled to name beers on tap, asked how I wanted my veggie burger prepared, and told my husband his ribs did not come with sides (even though the menu indicated a choice of potato).  But once the food came, we enjoyed it very much.  Another staff member offered to change the TV if we wanted to watch a particular game.  Our waitress cleared our plates, but did not bring our check.  Another staff member brought the check when we asked him about it.  I don't know if our waitress was new, or having a bad night.  The restaurant was not busy at all.  But my husband enjoyed the ambiance, and the food was very good.

data.title: The music was good.
data.text: I went there 1-10-15, the music was good. However, if you go, make sure you watch out for your drinks. I bought a bucket of beer, which had about 6 bottles, my friends and I took one each and left three. We went to dance and from the stage I noticed a an employee taking our bucket. When I ask where were my bottles, I couldn't hear or understand what he said. When I ask to talk to management, all I got was the run around. Will I ever go back, hell no. Would I recommend it, hell no. So if you decide to go here, make sure youwatch oout for your drinks, otherwise, it's going to cost you.

data.title: The wedge salad with a side of ahi was terrific!!!
data.text: The four of us met for lunch and I didn't want anything particularly heavy (although one of our party got the pastrami sandwich and LOVED it!), so I opted for a salad.  But which one, as there were many to choose from.  I decided to go easy and so ordered just the wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and bacon.  Well, maybe that wouldn't be enough, so I ordered to have some ahi on the salad. WOW.  What a terrific lunch it turned out to be.  Not only was there bacon, but the salad came with grilled onions!!!  Wonderful.  I recommend it.

data.title: DISCRIMINATION!!!
data.text: I am a stand up guy!!! And i would like to say if you are the same kind of person do not go here!!!! Thet discriminate!!! You might not even get in so dont waste your time!!!! Dont waste your well earned gas obey or your valuable time!!! I was treated uncivilized and unfair!!! Even had the cops called on me for really no reason!!!! Again if you are reading this dont waste your time! Go to another place and have a great time cause you wont have one here!!!

data.title: loud and fun
data.text: The room was too dark and music loud if you wanted to talk. However, music was excellent if wanted to dance. Food matched the price with good variety.

data.title: Nice Patio
data.text: We went to Original Mike's for a car show over Labor Day weekend. Was disappointed in the amount of "auto" memorabilia they had inside after reading they have museum quality pieces. The best part of the Original Mike's experience was the great patio. It's large with ample seating and great shade. The food was bland and the service was sub par. Wouldn't return.

data.title: Great R&B inside, Fun Karaoke Outside !
data.text: There was amazing talent, and sadly you can't be in both places at once. The patio has Palm trees with white christmas tree lights that sets an elegant mood. There was so many amazing singers, thought we were at a concert. We had great drinks, but no food. Will look forward to going back for dinner and dancing. The dance floor inside is huge. Great fun !

data.title: It's OK but nothing special
data.text: I have visited Original Mikes several times over the past three years and after each meal I wonder why I went there. It's a basic bar with general bland food and sometimes if you sit in the bar area it has that bar smell. The service every time I have been here has also been lacking. If you're in Santa Ana I suggest trying one of the many other great restaurants just blocks away.

data.title: Original Mikes Has Lost Its Originality
data.text: We visited the Saturday night before last and were looking forward to a nice dinner with six of our friends but what we got was disappointed.  Firstly, the service was awful.  The waiter must have been working in another area because we only saw him when he occasionally came back to the bar and our table was next to the bar.  We were not his priority, in the least.  The drinks were a joke.  I don't need a strong drink, just my moneys worth and these $10 plus cocktails were all mixers and no liquor. Both rounds were the same.  The lights went down after we were there awhile, and I don't mean dimmed, I mean down.  We had to get a flashlight to see the bill and the menus.  The food (all but the meatloaf) was dry and tasted reheated.  I've been here numerous times before and the food was good.  I don't what's happened but I know 8 people who will not go back.  Gratuity was added to the bill even tho the service was shoddy at best and no manager could be found to discuss this with.  Finally, it's clear to me they no longer care about their dining guests.  The emphasis here is on entertainment and cover charges not what started out as their bread and butter.  Original Mikes has lost its originality and our business.

data.title: Needs new manager
data.text: I came to Original Mike's on a Tuesday around lunch time and i noticed that the manager was treating his co workers very poorly. I know from experience that the way he was being with them was wrong. I suggest that they get a new manager that does treat he's workers with disrespect. Thats one thing that made me not want to return to that restaurant and the food was ok. The server was very kind and respectful maybe the manager should learn from her.

data.title: Retro to the max
data.text: The kids love climbing on the cars, the saddles on the bar, and the fish hanging from the ceiling.  The old guys (us) liked the ambiance of an old saloon.  The food is great and the proportions are huge.

data.title: A fun, lively atmosphere!  This part of Santa Ana is worth seeing!
data.text: First of all, I took my 12 year old son and a friend here and we had a great time.  The food is good, atmosphere awesome.  I really want to support the redevelopment of Santa Ana.  This was once a run down, dangerous neighborhood.  If you eat here, spare enough time to walk around the artist's colony and take a look at all of the buildings that have been restored.  The neighborhood comes to life, especially on Fridays and Saturdays.

data.title: Great Lunch Spot
data.text: This restaurant is very convenient to the OC courthouse and makes a great stop for lunch. One of their specials is fish and chips. Can't be beat.

data.title: ENTERTAINMENT TOP NOTCH - ORIGINAL MIKES IS NOT!!!
data.text: Pay your entertainment JUAN! You have great bands that perform, yet I hear that you arent paying them what you say you are going to pay them, and you dont tell them till 1hr after they finish playing!  I go only for the bands, but I wont go any longer if I continue to hear this!! I will make it my mission to boycott every chance I get and write bad reviews of your establishment!  START PAYING THEM WHAT THEY DESERVE and write good checks, and dont promise them bar tabs and then retract and pull it out of their pay! Its BS Juan and you know it!

data.title: Alittle Mishap
data.text:
I just wanted you to know that every time ive been to Original Mike's, its been nothing but great fun. However, I was there this past weekend celebrating a birthday of a family member and im sad to say that My neice who was also there had $100.00 stolen out of her purse. Weve been here plenty of times and never had a problem like this and we always felt safe leaving our purses and things at our table when dancing and so forth. But, unfortunately this last time the money was taken and it was a very sad thing to have happen. What makes it even sadder is that in these types of situations there is no way to get the money back and thats really sad because this was all the money my neice had. I just want you to know that we dont hold it against the club at all, its just too bad that there are people amongst us who do such a terrible thing not thinking that their actions also reflects the club. So to whoever the sorry person was that did this, just remember that paybacks a b---- and what goes around comes around. Otherwise, we love Original MIkes and plan to go back again only we will be more catious next time.
Thankyou

data.title: Original Mikes; Restaurant or Gang Hang-out?
data.text:
First of all its filled with gang members over the entire weekend.  I went there to eat during the week and I had to be patted down and pass a metal detector wand test by a big fat bald guy who looked like he needed to be checked for weapons himself. I was thinking "am i going into a restaurant or prison?" 

Once we got in its an ok looking place but our waitor got my order wrong. No big deal except for the fact that they brought me the correct order within a couple minutes. What do they got heat lamps back there?! Anyways the food was ok nothing to brag about. Second time I went there was for a night out with a few friends on a friday. 

BIG MISTAKE!! Again we had to be patted down, I thought "what kind of people come here?" Well I found out soon enough. The place was crawling with the local gang members. There is no dress code so it was pretty obvious.  They played 80's music and hip hop. I saw two fights break out at the same time! I had to get out of there so we went outside to chill on the patio.  Then we saw our third fight which was between a short stocky female security guard picking a fight with the female they were kicking out for fighting in the club! The sad part was the other securitys were letting their security friend beat up the girl. Then this guy came walking out and saw the fight between the girl and the female security and stepped in to break them up and the fat bald security guard grabbed him and chokes him with his arms, and  him, a white security guard and another security guard proceed to beat the crap out of him. After slamming him to the ground, the fat security guard gets up and starts another fight with another random guy that was walking out for no reason and beats him up too. 
We saw the cops come and haul away they two guys that got beat up!! Seems like the fat secutiy guard and the rest of them should have been the ones  being hauled away.  Never going there again.

A few days later my friend shows me an old OC Register clip online about a shooting that happened at Original Mikes. I dont know how they still have their doors open?? Well to make a long story longer, its filled with local gangsters, security gangs up and menaces their clientele, security themselves look like gangmembers like if they hired a local gang to look over the place. Scary if you ask me.  Wouldn't recomend it to anyone, unless you're good a dodging bullets.
